## Checklist

-   [ ] Ensure your code works with manual testing
-   [ ] Linter and other CI checks pass
-   [ ] Sign-off given on the changes (see [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/vector-im/element-desktop/blob/develop/CONTRIBUTING.md))
